title: Paramount board clears possible path for settling Trump’s ‘60 Minutes’ lawsuit
summary: Paramount’s board–which is pursuing a merger deal with Skydance that would need DOJ’s signoff–cleared the path to settle Trump’s lawsuit that accuses 60 Minutes of “deceptively” editing its pre-election interview with Kamala Harris
